amendment.description: An amendment numbered 53 printed in the Congressional Record to insert a new effective date of paragraph (1) to not take effect until a certification is submitted to Congress that any increase in the percentage of Federal lands leased for oil and gas production will not result in an increase in greenhouse gas emissions.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to insert a new effective date of paragraph (1) to not take effect until a certification is submitted to Congress that any increase in the percentage of Federal lands leased for oil and gas production will not result in an increase in greenhouse gas emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garcia, Robert amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 230 (Roll no. 60).

action.text: Amendment (A035) offered by Mr. Garcia, Robert.
